ERROR_CANCEL_TOASTR: Unfortunately, an error occurred while canceling your order. Our technical support has been notified and will contact you shortly.

WARNING_PERMANENT_ORDER:
The permanent order remains active until you change or delete it.
This also applies in the case of illness or other absences of the participant.

Cateringexpert is not liable for orders placed that are not picked up due to illness or other absences.

REGISTRATION_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Thank you for your registration. A confirmation email has been sent to your registered email address.

REGISTRATION_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_SPLIT_NOT_S: No subgroup assignment has been made. Only after the assignment can an order be placed.

SUBGROUP_REGISTER_STUDENT_INSTRUCTIONS_T: The participant must be assigned to a subgroup. If you do not know the subgroup, please select [Unknown]. The institution will then make the assignment.
SUBGROUP_REGISTER_STUDENT_INSTRUCTIONS: The participant must be assigned to a subgroup before ordering food.
SUBGROUP_REGISTER_STUDENT_INSTRUCTIONS_S: The institution assigns the subgroup to the respective student. Please contact the institution.
MANAGE_STUDENTS.TITLE: Participants
MANAGE_STUDENTS.NAME: Name
MANAGE_STUDENTS.EDIT_DESCRIPTION: To change the first or last name of the participant, enter the desired change and then click "Save".
MANAGE_STUDENTS.ALLERGY_FOOD_DESCRIPTION:
If the participant has allergies, please select the appropriate food. Allergen foods are set by the respective caterer. If you have any questions, please contact the respective caterer. If an allergen food is activated, it will automatically be transmitted to the caterer for all your orders.

Note: If the allergen food is changed afterward, this change will not be considered for already placed orders.
MANAGE_PERMANENT_ORDERS.NAME: Name
MANAGE_PERMANENT_ORDERS.EXISTING_ORDER: A permanent order already exists for the participant. To make changes to the permanent order, confirm the changes with the "Save" button.
MANAGE_PERMANENT_ORDERS.NEW_ORDER: To add or change a permanent order, select the desired days and menu for each day, then confirm the selection with the "Add" button.
MANAGE_PERMANENT_ORDERS_ERROR_NO_DAY: Please select at least one day

MANAGE_TENANT_SETTINGS.ERROR_INVALID_IBAN: The IBAN must start with the country code DE and have a valid length. Please check your input. Only German IBANs are allowed.
MANAGE_TENANT_SETTINGS.ORDER_CONFIRMATION_DESCRIPTION: Receive an email confirmation for orders and cancellations
MANAGE_TENANT_SETTINGS.BALANCE_REMINDER_DESCRIPTION: Receive a reminder when your balance falls below the specified amount
MANAGE_TENANT_SETTINGS.DISPLAY_ORDER_DESCRIPTION: If enabled, the entire week will be displayed in the app view

DESCRIPTION: To place an order, first select the desired date.
If you have multiple children, you can select the child for whom you want to order.
To order the dish, click on the box of the desired dish.
To cancel a dish, click the box of the desired dish again or the trash can icon.
To change a dish, you must first cancel the dish and then order the desired dish.
To view an entire week, click the box [Show entire week].
Additionally, you can place a permanent order. Go to [Permanent order].
Here you will find help for the individual functions of the application.
In the overview, you can see your current balance and your last orders.
You can cancel orders by clicking [Cancel].
If the field is grayed out, the deadline for cancellation has passed.
If there are messages from the caterer, institution, or Cateringexpert, they will be displayed here.
To mark the message as read, click [Close].
Old messages can be viewed under the [Notifications] tab.
Messages are automatically deleted after 30 days.
Permanent orders are automatically entered once the order deadline for the respective day has passed.
IMPORTANT: The permanent order runs until you change or delete it.
This also applies in case of illness or other absences of the participant.
If you do not have enough balance in the account, the order will not be executed.
If you have enabled email notifications for orders under [Settings], you will receive a confirmation or error message for each order via email.
No permanent orders are executed on closure days or holidays.
The entry of closure times is done by the caterer or institution.
To place a permanent order, go to [Edit] for the respective participant.
Then you can select the desired days and the menu for each day.
To confirm the permanent order, click [Add permanent order].
To register a participant (child) for ordering, enter the child's first and last name.
If the child has allergies, please select the appropriate food. The allergen foods are set by the respective caterer.
For multiple subgroups, please select the appropriate subgroup. If you do not know the subgroup, please select [Unknown].
If the setting of the subgroup is done only by the institution, this will be displayed in the view.
Without the assignment to a subgroup, no order can be placed.
To register another participant, click on [Add another participant].
In the account overview, you have an insight into all your deposits and withdrawals.
To create a CSV file, go to [CSV Export] and select the desired period.
To order food, your account must be topped up with money.
You can deposit money either by bank transfer or directly into your account.
Depositing by bank transfer is free and takes up to 3 working days.
If you want to deposit money directly, you will be redirected to our payment provider.
Depending on the payment provider, fees may apply. The estimated fees will be displayed.
To withdraw money from your account, click on [Withdraw money].
Here you will find all notifications sent by the institution, the caterer, or Cateringexpert.
Messages are automatically deleted after 30 days.
In the order history, you have an insight into all your orders and cancellations.
To search for a specific entry, enter the desired search term in the search field.
To create a CSV file, go to [CSV Export] and select the desired period.
To register a participant (child) for ordering, enter the child's first and last name.
If the child has allergies, please select the appropriate food. The allergen foods are set by the respective caterer.
For multiple subgroups, please select the appropriate subgroup. If you do not know the subgroup, please select [Unknown].
If the setting of the subgroup is done only by the institution, this will be displayed in the view.
Without the assignment to a subgroup, no order can be placed.
To register another participant, click on [Add another participant].
Under settings, you can adjust your master data and set your preferences for order confirmations and balance reminders.
The setting of the IBAN is required to be able to payout balances.
The provided email address is used to send order confirmations and balance reminders (if enabled).
Please confirm all changes with [Save].
The week plan is provided by your caterer and can be downloaded as a PDF.
Select the desired year and week for which you want to view the week plan.
Then click either on [View] or [Download].
If you have not yet created an account, go to [Register here].
Enter the Project ID you received from your institution and a valid email address you want to register with.
After registration, you will receive an email with your username (email address) and password.
To log in, enter your email address and password, then click [Log in].
IMPORTANT: Pay attention to the correct input of your password, including uppercase and lowercase letters.
For a detailed guide, click on [Click here for more help].
The PDF document will be downloaded in the selected language.
To activate education and participation for your account, you need to upload a current notice. Go to [Activate BuT] and upload the file.
Alternatively, you can send the notice by email to but@cateringexpert.de. Processing by email can take up to 7 working days.
Important: Please also provide your username and the name of the child for whom you are applying for education and participation.
Once the notice has been checked, education and participation will be activated for your account. You will receive a confirmation by email.
If a vacation is entered for a specific date or period, no recurring order will be placed by the system during this period.
A manual order is also not possible during the vacation period.
To add a vacation, select the desired period and click on [Add vacation].
Please note that both the start and end dates must be in the future.
If an order already exists for the desired period, it must be deleted first before a vacation can be entered.
To delete an existing vacation, click on [Delete vacation].

ACCOUNT.ERROR_WITHDRAW_FUNDS_NOT_ENOUGH: You currently have no balance in your account.
ACCOUNT.ERROR_WITHDRAW_FUNDS_NOT_IBAN:
To initiate a payout, please provide your bank account details and your current address.

You can enter and edit these details in the navigation under [Settings].
ACCOUNT.WITHDRAW_DEPOSIT_FUNDS_PROCESSED:
Your withdrawal has been received and is being processed.
It can take up to 5 working days for the money to be transferred to your account.
You can check the current status under [Account activity details].

Your deposit was successful!
The deposited amount has been credited to your account.
ACCOUNT.BETRAG_WURDE_GUTGESCHRIEBEN: The amount has been credited to your account.

Your deposit could not be completed.
Please check your input.

If the error persists, please contact support@cateringexpert.de
ACCOUNT.ACCOUNT.TEXT_BANNER: To top up your account, you must first add a student. Click here to add a student.
ACCOUNT.DEPOSIT_INSTRUCTIONS: To deposit money into your account, please transfer the desired amount to the following account:
ACCOUNT.USERNAME_NOTE: Please make sure to include your username
ACCOUNT.PURPOSE_INSTRUCTIONS: in the purpose field. Make sure to enter the username exactly as specified. Otherwise, your deposit cannot be assigned to your account. A manual review would then only be possible in writing and could take several working days.
ACCOUNT.DIRECT_DEPOSIT_DESCRIPTION:
Deposit money directly into your account with PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, or credit card. The money will be credited to your account immediately.
Enter the desired amount and click on [Direct deposit]. You will then be redirected to our payment provider.
ACCOUNT.FEES_NOTE:
Fees for individual payments are charged by payment providers.
Depositing via bank transfer is free of charge. We therefore recommend depositing via bank transfer.
The fee for the deposit is deducted directly from your deposit amount. For the following deposit amount, you would receive the following credit:
ACCOUNT.WITHDRAW_DETAILS: To withdraw your balance, click on [Withdraw money] and confirm your input afterward. Please note that a valid IBAN must be stored.
ACCOUNT.WITHDRAW_CONFIRMATION: Do you want to withdraw the following balance:
ACCOUNT.WITHDRAW_INSTRUCTIONS: The money will be transferred to your stored bank account. Your stored IBAN is:
ACCOUNT.PROFILE_NOTE: You can view and edit the bank details in your profile.
ACCOUNT.BANK_DETAILS_NOTE: Please ensure that the bank details are correct.
ACCOUNT.TRANSFER_DURATION: The transfer takes up to 5 working days

The order deadline for the respective order days is set by your catering provider. After the order deadline has passed, cancellation or modification of the order is no longer possible.
Important: We (Cateringexpert) have no influence on the order deadlines and cannot change them. We also cannot make changes after the order deadlines have passed.
We thank you for your understanding.

BUT.WICHTIG_BUT: The costs for the food will only be covered after the application has been approved by us. Until then, you must bear the costs yourself. The costs will be covered retroactively.

If you activate an allergen meal, the regular menu will be deactivated. Only one menu can be activated for your order.
The setting has been made by your caterer or institution.
To change the allergen meal afterward, please contact your caterer or institution.
